title: AI & Open Source News
topic: Latest breakthroughs and powerful free-tier releases in generative AI, focusing on open-source models and major platforms like OpenAI (GPT), Google (Gemini), Anthropic (Claude), and Groq. Specifically search for advancements in free-to-use image and video generation tools.

title: Haryana News
topic: Summarize the most important local news from Haryana, focusing on developments in Hisar, infrastructure projects, and local government announcements.
